SMSContent:
Your order {#orderid#} with amount Rs {#orderamount#} has been placed successfully! Track your order here: {#url#}.

Team SastaSundar

Dear {#pname#},
Your order {#orderid#} has been delivered! For any assistance, feel free to call {#customercare#}.
SastaSundar wishes you health & happiness.

Dear {#pname#},
your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled. A refund of Rs {#refundamount#} has been initiated to your source account and it shall get credited to your account within 5 - 7 working days.
SastaSundar wishes you health & happiness.

Dear {#pname#},
your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled.

SastaSundar wishes you health & happiness.

Your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled due to prescription mismatch. A refund of Rs {#refundamount#} has been initiated to your source account and it shall get credited to your account within 5 - 7 working days.

Please upload a new prescription and order again.

Team SastaSundar

Your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled due to prescription mismatch. Please upload a new prescription and order again.

Team SastaSundar

Your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled due to some unavoidable circumstances. A refund of Rs.{#refundamount#} has been initiated to your source account and it shall get credited to your account within 5 - 7 working days.

Team SastaSundar

Dear {#pname#},

Your order {#orderid#} has been cancelled due to some unavoidable circumstances.

Team SastaSundar

Your order {#orderid#} from SastaSundar has been modified due to unavailablity of {#products#}. A refund of Rs.{#onlinerefund#} has been initiated to your source account.

View updated order: {#url#}

Your order {#orderid#} from SastaSundar has been modified due to unavailablity of {#products#}. Your billed amount has been adjusted accordingly.

View updated order: {#url#}

Your order {#orderid#} from SastaSundar has been modified due to unavailablity of {#products#}. A refund of Rs.{#walletrefund#} has been initiated to your wallet.

View updated order: {#url#}

Your order {#orderid#} from SastaSundar has been modified due to unavailablity of {#products#}. A refund of Rs.{#onlinerefund#} has been initiated to your source account and rest to your SS wallet.

View updated order: {#url#}

Dear {#pname#},

Your orders containing {#products#} items have been shipped. Track your orders in the SastaSundar app.
